1370: Ermegardis was born in Den Hof in 1370.
Got married to Seukinus at age 19 in 1370.
1373: Gave birth to Baua in 1373 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Salome in 1374 at age 23.
1376: Gave birth to Katerina in 1376 at age 25.
Lost daughter Baua when Baua was 4 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Helyana in 1377 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Coppesoeten in 1379 at age 28.
1380: Lost daughter Helyana when Helyana was 4 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Butsel in 1383 at age 32.
1386: Gave birth to Wendelmodis in 1386 at age 35.
1389: Gave birth to Moerseil in 1389 at age 38.
